00047 template<int numRows, int numColumns, class T = double>
00048 class Matrix : public MatrixBase<T>
00049 {
00050   public:
00051       
00052     inline Matrix() {}
00057     inline Matrix(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00061     ~Matrix() {}
00067     virtual T *getElementsPointer() const { return (T *) &d_element[0][0]; }
00072     virtual int getNumRows() const {return numRows;}
00076     virtual int getNumColumns() const {return numColumns;}
00080     inline ColumnVector<numRows, T> getColumn(int columnNumber) const;
00085     inline RowVector<numColumns, T> getRow(int rowNumber) const;
00090     inline virtual T getElement(int row, int column) const;
00096     inline virtual void setElement(int row, int column, T elementValue);
00104     template<int subNumRows, int subNumColumns, class X>
00105     void getSubMatrix(int pivotalRow, int pivotalColumn, Matrix<subNumRows, subNumColumns, X> &subMatrix) const;
00115     template<int subNumRows, int subNumColumns, class X>
00116     void setSubMatrix(int pivotalRow, int pivotalColumn, const Matrix<subNumRows, subNumColumns, X> &subMatrix);
00131     inline T &operator()(int row, int column); 
00143     inline T operator()(int row, int column) const;
00154     inline MatrixInitializer<T> operator=(const T &elementValue);
00166     inline Matrix &operator=(const MatrixBase<T> &matrixBase);
00174     inline Matrix operator+(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &secondMatrix);
00181     inline Matrix operator-(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &secondMatrix);
00188     inline Matrix operator*(const T &scalar);
00196             inline Matrix operator/(const T &scalar);
00204     friend ostream &operator<< <>(ostream &output, const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00211     friend istream &operator>> <>(istream &input, Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00220     friend bool operator== <>(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &leftHandSideMatrix, 
00221                         const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &rightHandSideMatrix);
00227     friend bool operator!= <>(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &leftHandSideMatrix, 
00228                         const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &rightHandSideMatrix);
00237 protected:
00238 
00239     T d_element[numRows][numColumns];
00243 };

00248 template<int firstMatrixNumRows, int commonDimension, int secondMatrixNumColumns, class T>
00249 Matrix<firstMatrixNumRows, secondMatrixNumColumns, T> operator* (const Matrix<firstMatrixNumRows, commonDimension, T> &firstMatrix, 
00250                                         const Matrix<commonDimension,secondMatrixNumColumns, T> &secondMatrix);
00257 template<int commonDimension, class T>
00258 T operator* (const Matrix<1, commonDimension, T> &firstMatrix, const Matrix<commonDimension, 1, T> &secondMatrix);
00269 template<int numRows, int numColumns, class T>
00270 Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> operator*(const int &scalar, const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00278 template<int numRows, int numColumns, class T>
00279 Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> operator*(const double &scalar, const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00287 template<int numColumns, int numRows, class T>
00288 Matrix<numColumns, numRows, T> transpose(const Matrix<numRows, numColumns, T> &matrix);
00292 template<int size, class T>
00293 Matrix<size, size, T> inverse(const Matrix<size, size, T> &matrix);
00298 template<int size>
00299 Matrix<size, size, double> unitMatrix();
00309 };
